name: Conundrum Catacombs Production Demo
description:
Check out the games progress on YouTube! 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeUhoO9j08mWWFjgFzr1SPghttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeUhoO9j08mWWFjgFzr1SPg

Welcome to the ultimate dungeon-crawling adventure! In this 2D game, you'll navigate treacherous corridors and dark caverns with nothing but your trusty torch to light the way. But be warned - if your torch burns out, it's game over!



With its stunning pixel graphics and immersive gameplay, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat as you explore intricate labyrinths filled with danger and mystery. Use your wits to solve puzzles and uncover hidden secrets, all while keeping your torch lit and your nerves steady.

With multiple levels to explore and ever-increasing challenges to overcome, this game will put your skills to the test. Do you have what it takes to conquer the darkness and emerge victorious? Only the bravest and most resourceful adventurers will make it to the end - will you be one of them?

  • Explore over 28+ levels
  • Maintain your torch levels in order to survive the darkness
  • Resolve unique and hand-crafted puzzles
  • Reach the TOP and clear the darkness
  • Discover the secrets of the Catacomb
  • Achievements are waiting to be collected by you!
  • Follow along with the game progress on YouTube!

Thank you!
